title: Digital Marketing Overview
headline: Explore digital marketing such as the AIDA marketing funnel and email marketing strategies with this free online course.
description: With over 3 billion internet users, digital marketing has made it possible to reach a wide range of people through various online tools to market products and services. In this free online digital marketing course, you will learn about an AIDA marketing funnel and its implementation, which will help you create online marketing strategies including web- and email marketing using platforms such as Wix, for your business.
courseDescription:
Digital Marketing Overview is a free online course that has been specially prepared to take you through proven functional digital marketing strategies. To start you will learn about the AIDA marketing funnel process, and how to create an online marketing flow that funnels the right customers. The course describes the various steps that occur when a person enters the awareness stage of a marketing funnel to when a decision is made. In the past, AIDA was used by sales copywriters who printed ads in publications. Today, many people teach copywriting based on the AIDA principle without realising its usage. This course provides an in-depth analysis of the AIDA marketing funnel and how to utilize its full potentials. It describes a customerâ€™s journey through the AIDA funnel. The biggest mistake people make when marketing is moving a potential customer to the action phase. This course will teach you about the different steps in the AIDA marketing funnel and guide you through building your own AIDA marketing funnel. If you want to learn about ethical marketing and the features of a good AIDA marketing funnel, this course comes highly recommended.

Email Marketing is important and highly recommended in any business. If you want to learn email marketing tactics and how to use email marketing to develop a better relationship with your customers, you should complete this course. Email marketing can be complex and cost-intensive. However, this course will take you through comprehensive illustrations to make your learning process easy. By the end of this course, you will be able to effectively implement email marketing strategies using Wix at a minimal cost. This course illustrates how to create a landing page and use Wix landing pages to build an email list. You will learn how to set up an email autoresponse sequence and how to turn emails into Passive Income with an autoresponse sequence. Also, you will learn how to send email shout outs through Wix. This course illustrates copywriting tips to help you write better ads and emails that will earn you a click. In email marketing, sending chunks of emails does not give the desired result of having customers subscribe or click your link. This course will teach you the keys to remember when pitching products or emails.  

Furthermore, everyone can create a webinar. However, not every webinar is successful. There basic criteria for creating a successful webinar. Also, there are formats that need to be implemented. What works for you? Who is your target audience? Will they prefer life or pre-recorded webinar? This course will discuss in detail these criteria and formats. How do you get a potential audience from social media to the sale? This course will teach you how to utilize social media and marketing strategies. You can use every method of information sharing at your disposal and still get a very disappointing turnout at your webinar. This course will teach you how to use the information-sharing techniques effectively to drive traffic to your webinar. You will learn about certain mistakes that must be considered during a webinar. This course distinguishes presentations from webinars and shares various presentation tips. The learning contents in this course are crucial for students, researchers, entrepreneurs, business personnel and anyone interested in an excellent working knowledge of digital and email marketing. So, register for this course and start your next learning.

Start Course Now

  • Lesson Summary
    • The steps in any AIDA marketing funnel: Attention phase, interest phase, desire phase and the action phase.
    • The purpose of the attention phase is to move people to the interest phase on the AIDA sales funnel.
    • The desired content is usually delivered and maintained over a period of time.
    • Types of desire contents include:
      - Pdf resources
      - Automated email information
      - Free training courses
      - Webinars
    • Interest content deepens the initial impact of the attention content. It is usually introductory in nature.
    • Interest content is also referred to as long-tail content.
    • Always reserve the "HOW" for your action content. If you giveaway " how" they wot need your said services.
    • To build an AIDA marketing funnel, you will need some mind map software.
    • An AIDA marketing funnel does not manipulate people. it helps them through purchasing decisions.
    • The psychological flow that a potential customer goes through when purchasing a service or product is called.

  • Upon the successful completion of this module, you should be able to:
    • Analyze how to use Wix email marketing.
    • Describe how to send shout-outs through Wix.
    • Explain how to set up a landing page to build an email list.
    • Recall how to set up a form on a landing page to capture emails.
    • Discuss how to do a shout out with email marketing through Wix. 
    • Outline the keys to remember when pitching products or emails.
    • List the attributes of a good salesman.

  • Lesson Summary 
    • Wix can be used for email marketing, hosting products, consulting, analytics. All these are hosted on the same website.
    • Working with Wix is cost-friendly.
    • In online marketing, landing pages are used to drive visitors towards conversion by getting them to click through to a specific action.
    • While creating your email auto-response, it is important to give value or a potential sale of a product.
    • While setting up an auto-response sequence, adding a video in your very first mail is important. This could help spark interest in your future emails.
    • A good salesman should focus on trust, respect and rapport.
    • While pitching products or emails, it important to create urgency, value and touch the objection.
    • Always give more value to get a click
    • Your auto-response email should contain the problem and the solution.
  • Learning Outcomes 
  • Upon the successful completion of this module, you should be able to:
    • Outline the risk involved in creating a poor webinar.
    • Define webinars and their purpose.
    • List the methods of information sharing.
    • Describe the process of using social media to promote your webinars.
    • State five email marketing tips. 
    • Distinguish between pre-recorded and life webinars.
    • List the criteria that are essential for a successful webinar.

  • Lesson Summary 
    • A webinar is a great inexpensive way to reach a loud number of ppl. It is a great tool if you want to market a product, train employees or demonstrate a new task.
    • Webinars are used as marketing tools in several ways; they help you connect with people to generate feedback, they offer the opportunities to demonstrate expertise amongst others.
    • Successful webinars require relevant information sharing.
    • The method for information sharing includes; Announce the webinar, keynote speech, meetings and offers.
    • No matter how perfect your webinar is, you must include passion and value that directly translates to your target audience.
    • In order to provide value, you need to understand what motivates your customer.
    • It is important that you grab the attention of your audience immediately.
    • In other to find the right format for creating a webinar, you will need to know your audience.
    •  Pre-recorded webinars are the easiest webinars to create.
    • A two-person team will ensure that your webinar runs smoothly.
    • Blogpost and whitepapers are useful methods of marketing. People are more likely to read a blog post and white papers when they have a high ranking on search engine.
    • An SEO looks at; the content, links and the site.
    • Email marketing is cost-effective and provides a large ROI when it is implemented correctly.
    • When offering exclusive deals, you need to avoid sounding like you are offering a sales pitch.
  • Learning Outcomes 
  • Upon the successful completion of this module, you should be able to:
    • Explain how to send a reminder email.
    • Describe the process of driving up registration for a webinar.
    • Outline basic characteristics of strong visuals.
    • Explain the useful tools that allow you to connect with your audience.
    • Identify common mistakes made during the creation of webinars
    • Discuss how to interact with the target audience in a webinar.

  • Lesson Summary
    • As the date of your webinar draws closer, it is important to remain vigilant and increase your work.
    • A reminder email should include; day and time, any necessary instruction, contact information and the remainder of the benefits of the webinar.
    • You should always test your technology before hosting a webinar.
    • It is important to drive up registration ahead of time to secure the interest of current and potential customers.
    • Your title should reflect the way your webinar will benefit your target audience.
    • You need to solicit questions during the signup process high abandonment rate on your registration page indicates that your form is too long.
    • In a presentation, a slide show will have more impact than a single spreadsheet.
    • Visuals are an important part of any presentations.
    • Polls and surveys are useful tools that allow you to connect with your audience
    • Introducing different activities throughout the webinar will encourage audience involvement and increase interaction.
    • polls, surveys, activities, solicited questions and Q&A sessions all help you interact with your audience
    • Technical issues are common problems for webinars.
    • In every presentation, you must ask for participation. one useful tip for encouraging audience participation is to plant a ringer
